medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports on and off epigastric pain for the past 3 months, occurring around once weekly. On the day prior to admission, she experienced a similar episode that started after dinner, with pain worse than before, located in RUQ and epigastrium radiating to the back. Associated symptoms included nausea and vomiting, with some scant blood in vomitus after multiple episodes. Denies fevers, chills, diarrhea, or constipation.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of hepatobiliary disease.
